GSD.description:
kprobes: kretprobe events missing on 2-core KVM guest

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit 2b7e6a07345bb27df0e85a00a7961e25aae25215. For more details please see the references link.
